entry.tran: 疏忽的;不注意的;马虎的
entry.def: If you describe someone as neglectful, you think they fail to do everything they should do to look after someone or something properly.
If someone is neglectful of something, they do not give it the attention or consideration that it should be given.

means.word_mean: 2. not showing due care or attention;
